head.supplied: March 1885 ¶ ¶ [Letter read from Baron Von Müeller enclosing as a present a lithograph portrait of Labillardiere. The Council being informed by the Curator ¶ that Govt. were willing to have copies s...

div.p: RSA/A/5 Council minute book, Royal Society of Tasmania Archives, Hobart.
Letter not found; item is an entry in the minutes of the monthly meeting of the Council of the Society, 31 March 1885. March 1885

[Letter read from Baron Von Müeller enclosing as a present a lithograph portrait of Labillardiere. The Council being informed by the Curator
Alex Morton. that Govt. were willing to have copies struck off, agreed that 450 be asked for in order that one might be bound in each no. of the Journal for 1885
The lithograph was published as a frontispiece to the Papers and proceedings of the Royal Society of Tasmania, 1885 (1886) with biographical notes by M in the same volume, pp.334-5 (B86.13.02). See also M to J. Agnew, July 1885 (in this edition as 85-07-00). ]
